org.apache.hama.graph

Interface VertexInterface<V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - this type must be writable and should also implement equals and hashcode.
    E - the type used for storing edge values, usually the value of an edge.
    M - the type used for messaging, usually the value of a vertex.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<VertexInterface<V,E,M>>, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<VertexInterface<V,E,M>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Vertex

    public interface VertexInterface<V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<VertexInterface<V,E,M>>
    The vertex interface.

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        void setup(HamaConfiguration conf)
        This method is called once before the Vertex computation begins. Since the Vertex object is serializable, variables in your Vertex program always should be declared a s static.

      • getVertexID

        V getVertexID()
        Returns:
        the unique identification for the vertex.
